name: SQL Change Data Capture Source
shortDescription: Capture changes to an SQL database table and publish the change events to a Kafka topic.

Variables.Name: output
Variables.Description: The output topic for the captured data.

Variables.Name: last_modified_column
Variables.Description: The column holiding the last modified or update date and time. e.g. `timestamp`

Variables.Name: time_delta
Variables.Description: The amount of time in the past to look for data.  It should be in this format. `0,0,0,0,0` These are seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks. `30,1,0,0,0` therefore this is 1 minute and 30 seconds.

Variables.Name: offset_is_utc
Variables.Description: True or False depending on whether the last_modified_column is in UTC.

Variables.Name: columns_to_drop
Variables.Description: Comma separated list of columns to exclude from data copied from the target table to Quix.

Variables.Name: columns_to_rename
Variables.Description: Columns to rename while streaming to Quix. This must be valid json e.g. `\{"DB COLUMN NAME":"QUIX_COLUMN_NAME"\}` or `\{"source_1":"dest_1", "source_2":"dest_2"\}`

Variables.Name: poll_interval_seconds
Variables.Description: How often to check for new data in the source table.
